subject: Thoughts on 'Organic Growth' Influencers
body: I recently noticed a LinkedIn influencer with 'Organic Growth' highlighted in their profile and over 65K followers. They claim to help others grow their platforms but seem to be copying content from other influencers. I thought this was worth sharing.

subject: Support for Jobseekers
body: Job searching can be overwhelming. Applications, interviews, and follow-ups can create a lot of pressure. If you're wondering whether you are 'good enough,' please remember: it's not about your abilities but about a system where 60% of applicants never hear back. Your mental health matters most—take care of yourself. Your dream job will come; for now, just breathe.

subject: Job Search Reflections
body: Searching for jobs on LinkedIn sometimes feels like online dating: full of hope, but too often ending with being ghosted. You're not alone in feeling this way.

subject: Caution: LinkedIn Scams
body: Be wary of LinkedIn scams that claim you’ve been selected for a role you never applied for. Often, they ask you to pay a fee, such as Rs. 50,000, for the supposed opportunity. Please stay vigilant.

subject: Perspective on Job Aspirations
body: Sapne dekhna achi baat hai, lekin job ka sapna dekh ke 'interested' likhna, yeh toh achi baat nahi hai na? (Dreaming is good, but just writing 'interested' after dreaming about a job isn't very helpful.)

subject: Productivity Tip: Spotting Fake Stories
body: Next time I read a LinkedIn influencer's story, I'll start from the last line. If there's a link attached, it's probably fake. This little habit can save a lot of time!

subject: On Facing Job Rejection
body: Every time I invested my effort into multiple interviews and faced rejection, it was tough. But I've realized those setbacks often lead to better opportunities that align with my values and growth. If you're struggling with rejection, remember: the closed doors are protecting you from something you can't see yet. Your path is clearing for something even greater.

subject: You Are Not Alone in Your Job Search
body: To everyone seeking a job: I see you. Every rejection hurts, and waiting for responses can be exhausting. Remember, you are not alone—studies show 80% of jobseekers face anxiety and self-doubt. Take breaks, and always put your mental health ahead of any job. Your worth isn't defined by a job offer.

subject: Talent Is Not Defined by Company Name
body: It's easy to believe that working for a big company means having more talent, but that's not always true. I've seen incredible skill and dedication from people at lesser-known companies. Success isn't always measured by brand names—true happiness and growth come from doing what you love and improving your craft.

subject: A Message on Leadership and Growth
body: When I left a toxic workplace, I simply told my manager: 'I hope your son gets a manager like you.' This message was both honest and liberating. Whether it offends or is received as a blessing says much about one’s own conduct. It's a reminder to become the kind of leader you’d want for those you care about. Let's all strive to break the chain by being better.
